item.title: What I Know...
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: ...more than I thought. Without trying to get too excited about an announcement to come which will undoubtedly not live up to our excitement, Troy and I went from idea to application in 2 weeks with only about 5 real days of programming. I am surprised at how much we have learned and how much fun it is to create again (instead of just fixing and tweaking). There are only a few version 1.0s to happen in new markets. It is exhilarating.
